body.raw:
{
    "scopeName": "approvals2",
    "description": "Get approvals for training, travel and gear",
    "nsfPath": "ApprovalCentral.nsf",
    "schemaName": "default2",
    "isActive": true,
    "iconName": "sell",
    "create": true,
    "dqlAccess": true,

        "formulaType": "domino",
        "formula": "@True"
    },
    "allowCode": true,
    "openAccess": true,
    "requireRevisionToUpdate": false,
    "allowDecryption": true
}
